```{r, cache = TRUE, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
colors = c("#CC1011", "#665555", "#05a399", "#cfcaca", "#f5e840", "#0683c9", "#e075b0")

jun_data <- read_csv(here::here('csv', "uber-raw-data-jun14.csv"))
jul_data <- read_csv(here::here('csv', "uber-raw-data-jul14.csv"))
aug_data <- read_csv(here::here('csv', "uber-raw-data-aug14.csv"))

```


```{r}
data_2014 <- rbind(apr_data,may_data, jun_data, jul_data, aug_data, sep_data)

clean_data_2014 <- apr_data %>% 
  mutate(
    Year = format(as.Date(Date_Time, format = "%m/%d/%Y"), "%Y"),
    Month = format(as.Date(Date_Time, format = "%m/%d/%Y"), "%m"),
    Day = format(as.Date(Date_Time, format = "%m/%d/%Y"), "%d"),
    Date = paste(Year, Month, Day, sep = "-"),
    DayOfWeek = wday(Date, label = TRUE)
  )

clean_data_2014
```
